attributes.action: to ban any political party that does not accept all electors in the voter's list into it's  membership from contesting in any election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: all the people in the voter's list should be able to join any political party they wish, to participate in the democratic process , it is a voter's fundemental right. any party that does not conform to this rule should be banned from running in any election

rejection.details: Please rephrase your petition. Your title should be a clear call to action.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
